register.name: CNTFRQ
register.description: Holds the clock frequency of the system counter.

register.name: CNTHCTL
register.description: Controls the generation of an event stream from the physical counter, and access from Non-secure EL1 modes to the physical counter and the Non-secure EL1 physical timer.

bitField.name: EVNTI
bitField.description: Selects which bit (0 to 15) of the corresponding counter register (CNTPCT or CNTVCT) is the trigger for the event stream generated from that counter, when that stream is enabled.

bitField.name: EVNTDIR
bitField.description: Controls which transition of the counter register (CNTPCT or CNTVCT) trigger bit, defined by EVNTI, generates an event when the event stream is enabled:

bitField.name: EVNTEN
bitField.description: Enables the generation of an event stream from the corresponding counter:

bitField.name: PL1PCEN
bitField.description: Traps Non-secure PL0 and PL1 accesses to the physical timer registers to Hyp mode.

bitField.name: PL1PCTEN
bitField.description: Traps Non-secure PL0 and PL1 accesses to the physical counter register to Hyp mode.

register.name: CNTHP_CTL
register.gui_name: Counter-timer Hyp Physical Timer Control register
register.description: Control register for the Hyp mode physical timer.

register.name: CNTHP_CVAL
register.description: Holds the compare value for the Hyp mode physical timer.

register.name: CNTHP_TVAL
register.gui_name: Counter-timer Hyp Physical Timer TimerValue register
register.description: Holds the timer value for the Hyp mode physical timer.

register.name: CNTKCTL
register.description: Controls the generation of an event stream from the virtual counter, and access from EL0 modes to the physical counter, virtual counter, EL1 physical timers, and the virtual timer.

bitField.name: PL0PTEN
bitField.description: Traps PL0 accesses to the physical timer registers to Undefined mode.

bitField.name: PL0VTEN
bitField.description: Traps PL0 accesses to the virtual timer registers to Undefined mode.

bitField.name: EVNTI
bitField.description: Selects which bit (0 to 15) of the corresponding counter register (CNTPCT or CNTVCT) is the trigger for the event stream generated from that counter, when that stream is enabled.

bitField.name: EVNTDIR
bitField.description: Controls which transition of the counter register (CNTPCT or CNTVCT) trigger bit, defined by EVNTI, generates an event when the event stream is enabled:

bitField.name: EVNTEN
bitField.description: Enables the generation of an event stream from the corresponding counter:

bitField.name: PL0VCTEN
bitField.description: Traps PL0 accesses to the frequency register and virtual counter register to Undefined mode.

bitField.name: PL0PCTEN
bitField.description: Traps PL0 accesses to the frequency register and physical counter register to Undefined mode.

register.name: CNTPCT
register.description: Holds the 64-bit physical count value.

register.name: CNTP_CTL
register.description: Control register for the EL1 physical timer.

register.name: S_CNTP_CTL
register.description: Control register for the EL1 physical timer.

register.name: N_CNTP_CTL
register.description: Control register for the EL1 physical timer.

register.name: CNTP_CVAL
register.description: Holds the compare value for the EL1 physical timer.

register.name: S_CNTP_CVAL
register.description: Holds the compare value for the EL1 physical timer.

register.name: N_CNTP_CVAL
register.description: Holds the compare value for the EL1 physical timer.

register.name: CNTP_TVAL
register.description: Holds the timer value for the EL1 physical timer. This provides a 32-bit downcounter.

register.name: S_CNTP_TVAL
register.description: Holds the timer value for the EL1 physical timer. This provides a 32-bit downcounter.

register.name: N_CNTP_TVAL
register.description: Holds the timer value for the EL1 physical timer. This provides a 32-bit downcounter.

register.name: CNTVCT
register.description: Holds the 64-bit virtual count value.

register.name: CNTVOFF
register.description: Holds the 64-bit virtual offset.

register.name: CNTV_CTL
register.description: Control register for the virtual timer.

register.name: CNTV_CVAL
register.description: Holds the compare value for the virtual timer.

register.name: CNTV_TVAL
register.description: Holds the timer value for the virtual timer.

tcf:enumItem.description: A 0 to 1 transition of the trigger bit triggers an event.
tcf:enumItem.name: A_0_to_1_transition_of_the_trigger_bit_triggers_an_event

tcf:enumItem.description: A 1 to 0 transition of the trigger bit triggers an event.
tcf:enumItem.name: A_1_to_0_transition_of_the_trigger_bit_triggers_an_event

tcf:enumItem.description: Disables the event stream.
tcf:enumItem.name: Disables_the_event_stream

tcf:enumItem.description: Enables the event stream.
tcf:enumItem.name: Enables_the_event_stream

tcf:enumItem.description: Non-secure PL0 and PL1 accesses to the CNTP_CTL, CNTP_CVAL, and CNTP_TVAL are trapped to Hyp mode.
tcf:enumItem.name: Non_secure_PL0_and_PL1_accesses_to_the_CNTP_CTL_CNTP_CVAL_and_CNTP_TVAL_are_trapped_to_Hyp_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Non-secure PL0 and PL1 accesses to the CNTP_CTL, CNTP_CVAL, and CNTP_TVAL are not trapped to Hyp mode.
tcf:enumItem.name: Non_secure_PL0_and_PL1_accesses_to_the_CNTP_CTL_CNTP_CVAL_and_CNTP_TVAL_are_not_trapped_to_Hyp_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Non-secure PL0 and PL1 accesses to the CNTPCT are trapped to Hyp mode.
tcf:enumItem.name: Non_secure_PL0_and_PL1_accesses_to_the_CNTPCT_are_trapped_to_Hyp_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Non-secure PL0 and PL1 accesses to the CNTPCT are not trapped to Hyp mode.
tcf:enumItem.name: Non_secure_PL0_and_PL1_accesses_to_the_CNTPCT_are_not_trapped_to_Hyp_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer condition is not asserted.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_condition_is_not_asserted

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer condition is asserted.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_condition_is_asserted

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer output signal is not masked.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_output_signal_is_not_masked

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer output signal is masked.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_output_signal_is_masked

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer disabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer enabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: PL0 accesses to the CNTP_CTL, CNTP_CVAL, and CNTP_TVAL registers are trapped to Undefined mode.
tcf:enumItem.name: PL0_accesses_to_the_CNTP_CTL_CNTP_CVAL_and_CNTP_TVAL_registers_are_trapped_to_Undefined_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: PL0 accesses to the CNTP_CTL, CNTP_CVAL, and CNTP_TVAL registers are not trapped to Undefined mode.
tcf:enumItem.name: PL0_accesses_to_the_CNTP_CTL_CNTP_CVAL_and_CNTP_TVAL_registers_are_not_trapped_to_Undefined_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: PL0 accesses to the CNTV_CTL, CNTV_CVAL, and CNTV_TVAL registers are trapped to Undefined mode.
tcf:enumItem.name: PL0_accesses_to_the_CNTV_CTL_CNTV_CVAL_and_CNTV_TVAL_registers_are_trapped_to_Undefined_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: PL0 accesses to the CNTV_CTL, CNTV_CVAL, and CNTV_TVAL registers are not trapped to Undefined mode.
tcf:enumItem.name: PL0_accesses_to_the_CNTV_CTL_CNTV_CVAL_and_CNTV_TVAL_registers_are_not_trapped_to_Undefined_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: A 0 to 1 transition of the trigger bit triggers an event.
tcf:enumItem.name: A_0_to_1_transition_of_the_trigger_bit_triggers_an_event

tcf:enumItem.description: A 1 to 0 transition of the trigger bit triggers an event.
tcf:enumItem.name: A_1_to_0_transition_of_the_trigger_bit_triggers_an_event

tcf:enumItem.description: Disables the event stream.
tcf:enumItem.name: Disables_the_event_stream

tcf:enumItem.description: Enables the event stream.
tcf:enumItem.name: Enables_the_event_stream

tcf:enumItem.description: PL0 accesses to the CNTVCT are trapped to Undefined mode. PL0 accesses to the CNTFRQ register are trapped to Undefined mode, if CNTKCTL.PL0PCTEN is also 0.
tcf:enumItem.name: PL0_accesses_to_the_CNTVCT_are_trapped_to_Undefined_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: PL0 accesses to the CNTFRQ and CNTVCT are not trapped to Undefined mode.
tcf:enumItem.name: PL0_accesses_to_the_CNTFRQ_and_CNTVCT_are_not_trapped_to_Undefined_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: PL0 accesses to the CNTPCT are trapped to Undefined mode. PL0 accesses to the CNTFRQ register are trapped to Undefined mode, if CNTKCTL.PL0VCTEN is also 0.
tcf:enumItem.name: PL0_accesses_to_the_CNTPCT_are_trapped_to_Undefined_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: PL0 accesses to the CNTFRQ and CNTPCT are not trapped to Undefined mode.
tcf:enumItem.name: PL0_accesses_to_the_CNTFRQ_and_CNTPCT_are_not_trapped_to_Undefined_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer condition is not asserted.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_condition_is_not_asserted

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer condition is asserted.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_condition_is_asserted

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer output signal is not masked.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_output_signal_is_not_masked

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer output signal is masked.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_output_signal_is_masked

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer disabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer enabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer condition is not asserted.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_condition_is_not_asserted

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer condition is asserted.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_condition_is_asserted

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer output signal is not masked.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_output_signal_is_not_masked

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer output signal is masked.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_output_signal_is_masked

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer disabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Timer_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Timer enabled.
